00003 // \author Will Scott
00004 #include "dcsl_miabot_control_math.h"
00005 #include <math.h>
00006 
00007 
00015 void miabot_waypoint(double* output, double* pose, double* waypoint, double k1, double k2)
00016 {
00017         // min distance, where robot is considered 'close enough' to waypoint
00018         double min_dist = 0.02;
00019 
00020         // calculate distance from bot to waypoint
00021         double distance = sqrt(pow(pose[0]-waypoint[0],2) + pow(pose[1]-waypoint[1],2));
00022         // calculate angle of bot relative to line towards waypoint
00023         double phi = atan2(waypoint[1]-pose[1], waypoint[0]-pose[0]);
00024 
00025         // calculate forward speed v
00026         output[0] = k1*distance*cos(pose[2]-phi);
00027 
00028         // calculate angular speed omega
00029         if (distance > min_dist)
00030         {
00031                 // continue moving towards waypoint
00032                 output[1] = -k2*sin(pose[2]-phi);               
00033         }
00034         else
00035         {
00036                 // spin towards the desired direction
00037                 output[1] = -k2*sin(pose[2]-waypoint[2]);
00038         }
00039 }
